Mister-leo/fssh

Unlocks SSH keys with Touch ID on macOS

Related repos

  • 2FA client for Wear OS
  • Keychain wrapper for iOS, macOS, tvOS, and watchOS
  • Manages secrets through public key encryption
  • Automates macOS through keyboard, mouse, and screen control APIs
